entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols kerberos authentication for ldapconnection in kubernetes #57901
    area-System.DirectoryServices, untriaged
  • Further reduce Linq usage in ComponentModel.Annotations #57897
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, untriaged
  • SocketException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host. .net core #57895
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-103298-.NET7 #57892
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: RegexOptions.Constrained #57891
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, api-ready-for-review, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Hang when reading response data #57888
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add a GetDebuggerDisplay() to Object #57887
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged

Closed

  • BadImageFormatException when trying to load c++/cli .net 5 assembly into c# .net 5 project #57642
    needs more info, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • GCC build failure for JIT code #57861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged
  • GZipStream Read() method will block forever even thougn base stream has already data written #57893
    untriaged
  • Runtime tests failing `The given key 'appContextSwitch' was not present in the dictionary.` #57886
    blocking-clean-ci, untriaged
  • Pass number of bytes to Buffer.BlockCopy #33765
    api-approved, area-System.Runtime, code-analyzer, 6.0.0

Updated

  • [mono][aot] `.aotdata` files size increase compared to _legacy_ mono #57689
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Stack overflow and Consistency check failed: FAILED: m_crawl.pFrame->IsTransitionToNativeFrame() in System.Runtime.Tests #57807
    area-VM-coreclr, untriaged
  • Add support for reading, validating, and creating COSE_Sign/COSE_Sign1 messages #32121
    area-System.Security, Future
  • Task.Delay 100x slower on mono than coreclr on macOS #57877
    tenet-performance, untriaged, area-Threading-mono
  • System.Text.Json support to System.Runtime.Serialization #29975
    area-System.Text.Json, Future
  • Getting rid of ImmutableArray<T>.IsDefault ? #26829
    area-System.Collections, Future
  • Enum.ToString is slower than explicit implementation #57748
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add method TryFormat for Enum #57881
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Possible .NET optimization opportunities for an accumulated multiply-add loop #56855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, optimization, Priority:2, 7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS8795 error with file-scoped namespaces #57880
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-runtime-.NET 6, runtime #runtime-101520-.NET6 #57259
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 1 #runtime-102558-.NET6RC1 #57711
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • User Story: .NET 7.0 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #57797
    area-Meta, User Story, Priority:2, Cost:L, Bottom Up Work, Team:Libraries, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] Race between reading response and reset? #57617
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Http server performance regression in net6 preview 7 #57656
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, tenet-performance, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • [QW, Test] add more JitStress values. #57900
    NO REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Remove stray #nullable disable from SkipLocalsInit.cs #57889

Merged

  • Skip RuntimeEventSource tests on wasm and android #57890
    auto-merge
  • [main] Update dependencies from dnceng/internal/dotnet-optimization dotnet/arcade #57878
  • Fix a few gcc warnings in jit #57744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable SocketHttpHandler to decompress zlib or deflate #57862
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Fix VN incorrect optimizations with a new JitEEInterface function. #57282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix `StringSegment.Buffer` can be null #57858
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Optimize division by constant after AND or RSZ #55778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix PerfScore inconcistencies #56812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Propagate BBF flags during hoisting #57825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add event to RuntimeEventSource for AppContext switches #57847
